description: Multiple untrusted search path vulnerabilities in Camtasia Studio 7.0.1 build 57 allow local users to gain privileges via a Trojan horse (1) MFC90ENU.DLL or (2) MFC90LOC.DLL file in the current working directory, as demonstrated by a directory that contains a .cmmp or .camrec file.  NOTE: the provenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solely from third party information.
